Articles.Content: Hello people of Kerbal Space Program! I have been having some trouble with mods lately, and it's with extraplanetary launchpads, one of my favorite mods. I was trying to build a mining rig on minimus, and it wasnt working. I checked my electric charge, Material Kits & Specialized parts, but it was sufficent. Note: (i'm using MKS/OKS, so it's Mt+sp. I have had this problem with out it, but it got fixed and I forgot how.) A little help please? and could you guys tell me incompatible mods for either MKS/OKS or EL? Thanks, and happy holidays!

21 hours ago, Vinhero100 said:

Hello people of Kerbal Space Program! I have been having some trouble with mods lately, and it's with extraplanetary launchpads, one of my favorite mods. I was trying to build a mining rig on minimus, and it wasnt working. I checked my electric charge, Material Kits & Specialized parts, but it was sufficent. Note: (i'm using MKS/OKS, so it's Mt+sp. I have had this problem with out it, but it got fixed and I forgot how.) A little help please? and could you guys tell me incompatible mods for either MKS/OKS or EL? Thanks, and happy holidays! 

 

According to the EPL thread it is not compatible with 1.2.2 yet.  (Specifically it disables itself on 1.2.2)

You'll need to wait for the mod to update, or step back to 1.2.1 (if you kept that version around).

 

Edit:  Apparently EPL has been updated for 1.22 recently:

 

Edited December 20, 2016 by Shadowmage
Oh wait I'm sorry I'm using ksp 1.2.0

OMG!!! I just found out what was wrong... I guess there is a minimum productivity, and I wasnt reaching it. I sent Kerbals to Minimus to test it, and It worked! Sorry about this.... I will keep you updated on how my kolonizing is going!

 

Edited December 20, 2016 by Vinhero100
